org.cornutum.tcases

Class ReducerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.ReducerOptions

  • public class ReducerOptions
extends Object
    Defines options that control test case reducing.

    • Method Detail

      • setFunction

        public void setFunction(String function)
        Changes the function for test case reduction. If null, reduce test cases for all functions.

      • getFunction

        public String getFunction()
        Returns the function for test case reduction. If null, reduce test cases for all functions.

      • setSamples

        public void setSamples(int samples)
        Changes the initial number of samples.

      • getSamples

        public int getSamples()
        Returns the initial number of samples.

      • setResampleFactor

        public void setResampleFactor(double resampleFactor)
        Changes the resample factor. The resampleFactor determines the number of samples in the next round of reducing. Depending on the resampleFactor, the next round may use more or fewer samples.

        If the previous round called for N samples and produced a reduction, then the number of samples for the next round will be N * ( 1 + resampleFactor). To increase sample count with each round, define resampleFactor > 0. To decrease sample count with each round, define -1 < resampleFactor < 0.

      • getResampleFactor

        public double getResampleFactor()
        Returns the resample factor.

      • setNewSeed

        public void setNewSeed(boolean newSeed)
        Changes if test case reduction starts by ignoring any previous random seed.

      • isNewSeed

        public boolean isNewSeed()
        Returns if test case reduction starts by ignoring any previous random seed.

      • builder

        public static ReducerOptions.Builder builder()
        Returns a new ReducerOptions builder.

        public String toString()
